labels.reveal: Reveal table (also click outside of window)

description.intro: Guess the word in six tries. Each guess must be a valid word. After each guess, the color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
description.daily: Daily challenge has six tries limit per day. A new word will be available each day.
description.letter_correct: The letter W is in the word and in the correct spot.
description.letter_incorrect_place: Letter O is correct but not in correct place
